trans-unit.source: Animates the value of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> property along a set of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> over a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 內沿著一組 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> 繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: A key frame animation's target values are defined by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> property, which contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame> objects.
trans-unit.target: 主要畫面格動畫的目標值會由其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>屬性，其中包含的集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame>物件。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame> defines a segment of the animation with its own target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.Value%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame>定義區段的與它自己的目標動畫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times.
trans-unit.target: 動畫執行時，執行時從一個索引鍵值到下一個在指定索引鍵的時間。

trans-unit.source: There are three types of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame> classes, one for each supported interpolation method: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteColorKeyFrame>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineColorKeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: 有三種類型的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame>類別，一個用於每個支援的內插補點方法： <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearColorKeyFrame>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteColorKeyFrame>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineColorKeyFrame>。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> can have more than two of target values.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimation>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames>可以有兩個以上的目標值。

trans-unit.source: You can also control the interpolation method of individual <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame> segments.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以控制個別的插補方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame>區段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added as the child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入成為這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 之子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 將子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame" /> 加入至這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />。

trans-unit.source: This method allows <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame> objects to be direct children of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> object in markup.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame>物件直屬子系的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames>標記中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The parameter <paramref name="child" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="child" /> 參數不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame" />。

trans-unit.source: The text added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 將文字字串當做這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的子系加入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an `InvalididOperationException` unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames>不接受文字做為子系，因此這個方法會引發`InvalididOperationException`除非在衍生的類別已覆寫允許加入文字的這項行為。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise this exception unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 不接受文字做為子系，因此除非衍生的類別已覆寫允許加入文字的這項行為，否則該方法會引發這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 使這個執行個體成為指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前的屬性值，讓這個執行個體成為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 之可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method should simply determine whether this instance can be frozen.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法只應判斷這個執行個體是否可凍結，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if this instance should actually freeze itself when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫這個方法時，這個執行個體應該實際凍結自身，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 使這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 物件的執行個體成為無法修改的狀態，或判斷它是否可以變成無法修改的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is true, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if this instance can be made read-only, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made read-only.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="isChecking" /> 為 true 時，如果這個執行個體可以變成唯讀狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="isChecking" /> is false, this method returns <see langword="true" /> if this instance is now read-only, or <see langword="false" /> if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="isChecking" /> 為 false 時，如果這個執行個體現在已經是唯讀狀態時，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="true" />，如果這個執行個體不可以成為唯讀狀態，則會傳回 <see langword="false" />，而副作用是會開始變更這個物件的凍結狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object to clone and freeze.
trans-unit.target: 要複製和凍結的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體製作為所指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 物件的複製品。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果這些屬性包含資源的參考或資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>失敗時嘗試凍結物件，並將擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: 要複製和凍結的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體製作為指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的凍結複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: 建議的原始值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的起始值，便會使用這個值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: 建議的目的值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的結束值，便會使用這個值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" /> that generates the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" /> used by the host animation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock" />，產生主機動畫所用的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 計算值，這個值表示正在建立動畫之屬性的目前值 (由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 執行個體所決定)。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的計算值，由目前的執行個體所決定。

trans-unit.source: If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值，否則這個值會以鏈結中前一個動畫所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不是 <c4 > <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫會在動畫的屬性上的第一個組合圖層中; 否則值是從上一個組合層次屬性的動畫的輸出值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> whose natural duration is desired.
trans-unit.target: 需要其自然持續期間的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />。

trans-unit.source: Provide a custom natural <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> property is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 時，提供自訂的自然 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: If the last key frame of this animation is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />, then this value is used as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration" />; otherwise it will be one second.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個動畫的最後一個主要畫面格是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />，則這個值會當成 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration" />，否則會是一秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the animation's output value is added to the base value of the property being animated.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定動畫是否將其輸出值加到所要繪製之屬性的基底值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the animation adds its output value to the base value of the property being animated instead of replacing it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果動畫會將它的輸出值加至正在建立動畫之屬性的基底實值上而不是取代該值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否在動畫重複時累加動畫值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the animation accumulates its values when its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> property causes it to repeat its simple duration; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果當動畫的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 屬性造成動畫重複其簡單的持續期間時，要往上累加動畫的值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，動畫之輸出值只會累積時的動畫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續期間。

trans-unit.source: It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 它不會累積它的值因為重複其父代重新啟動時，或它的時鐘已重新啟動從<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame" /> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定定義動畫之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame" /> objects that define the animation.
trans-unit.target: 定義動畫的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrame" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrameCollection.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorKeyFrameCollection.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Called when the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> object is modified.
trans-unit.target: 修改目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 物件時進行呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> property of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> should be value-serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames" /> 執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ColorAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 屬性值應該是進行值的序列化，則傳回 true。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性值應進行序列化則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的子物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入物件中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將節點的文字內容加入物件中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an ordered collection P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames associated with this animation sequence.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與這個動畫序列相關的已排序集合 P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation.KeyFrames" />。
